metadata.name: Ashura: Requiem...Rebellion...I
metadata.description:
Ashura is 1400 years of pain, requiem, rebellion.
It is the pain of Hazrat Hussein and his followers who were left in hunger and thirst and then massacred together with their children in Karbala.
The pain of the Ashura Mourning is shared and rebelled through different rituals in different places.
In some regions in Iran, this pain, this requiem, this rebellion is symbolized by making mud of sand brought from desert and people cover their own bodies with this mud.

The buyer will receive the  certificated print version

1/1 Edition

6000x4000
300 Pix/inc
